entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
